name: lykke-hft-client
author: Lykke
description: Lykke HFT API Library with typescript type definitions and works in node.js and browser javascript.

scripts.build: npm -s run-script tsc && webpack && node node_modules/uglify-es/bin/uglifyjs --source-map -c -m -o highFrequencytradingAPIBundle.min.js highFrequencytradingAPIBundle.js
